<h3 id="X38112">X(38112) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(5), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*(b+c)*a^3-(3*b^2+8*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2-4*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+3*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38112) = 2*X(1)-5*X(632) = X(3)+5*X(3617) = 2*X(3)+X(37705) = X(5)-4*X(10) = 7*X(5)-4*X(946) = 5*X(5)-4*X(3817) = 13*X(5)-4*X(4301) = X(5)+2*X(5690) = 11*X(5)-8*X(9955) = 5*X(5)-8*X(9956) = 3*X(5)-4*X(10175) = 5*X(5)+4*X(11362) = 5*X(5)-2*X(22791) = 11*X(5)-20*X(31399) = 3*X(5)-2*X(38034) = X(5)+4*X(38127) = 7*X(10)-X(946) = 5*X(10)-X(3817) = 13*X(10)-X(4301) = 2*X(10)+X(5690) = 11*X(10)-2*X(9955) = 5*X(10)-2*X(9956) = 3*X(10)-X(10175) = 5*X(10)+X(11362) = 10*X(10)-X(22791) = 11*X(10)-5*X(31399) = 6*X(10)-X(38034) = 10*X(3617)-X(37705) = 2*X(10247)-3*X(10283)</b>

<p>
X(38112) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {8, 10246}, {10, 38127}, {72, 10273}, {165, 355}, {3654, 5587}, {3679, 26446}, {3817, 11362}, {4669, 10165}, {5603, 34718}, {5657, 5790}, {5686, 38121}, {5690, 38042}, {9812, 12702}, {38126, 38200}<br>
X(38112) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5, 38042), (549, 26446), (550, 165), (1483, 10246), (3817, 9956), (3845, 5587), (5603, 547), (5690, 38127), (5731, 12100), (5882, 31662), (9812, 546), (10246, 140), (10283, 2), (11230, 3828), (15699, 19875), (16200, 5901), (17502, 6684), (22791, 3817), (34773, 17502), (38028, 11231), (38034, 10175), (38041, 38204), (38042, 10), (38138, 5790), (38170, 38200), (38176, 4745)<br>
X(38112) = complement of X(10247)<br>
X(38112) = X(37705)-Gibert-Moses centroid<br>
X(38112) = X(8)-Beth conjugate of-X(38042)<br>
X(38112) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (8, 140, 1483), (10, 5690, 5), (10, 8256, 31419), (10, 11362, 9956), (40, 18357, 3627), (631, 4678, 12645), (1482, 9780, 3628), (3525, 3621, 37624), (3697, 37562, 31835), (5657, 38074, 9778), (5690, 22791, 11362), (5790, 38066, 5657), (5818, 12702, 546), (9956, 11362, 22791), (9956, 22791, 5), (10175, 38034, 5), (11231, 38028, 11539), (38034, 38042, 10175), (38081, 38138, 5790), (38128, 38129, 26446)<br>
